mapper.update:
update quality_pro_management
pro_name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
build_id = #{buildId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pre_status = #{preStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
start_status = #{startStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
start_file = #{startFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_last_modified = #{gmtLastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update quality_pro_management set pro_name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_id = #{buildId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pre_status = #{preStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, start_status = #{startStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, start_file = #{startFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_last_modified = #{gmtLastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT qpm.pro_id,qpm.pro_name,so.name AS build_name,qpm.start_status,qpm.start_file FROM quality_pro_management AS qpm INNER JOIN sys_org AS so
qpm.build_id = so.org_id

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM quality_pro_management WHERE pro_name = #{proName}
